name: The Golden Lineage
declaringWar: Forefathers, one and allâ€¦ Bear witness!
attacked: A lowly Tarnished, playing as a lord... I command thee, kneel!
defeated: I am Lord of all that is Golden... And one day, we'll return together to our home... bathed in rays of gold...
introduction: Welcome, little lord, Thy shall witness the lord of all that is golden!
neutralNo: I rather be grafted myself than to accept this.
hateHello: What must this unworthy one need?
hateNo: I shalt not agree to that!
afterPeace: Thou shalt have peace. Thou'rt unfit even to graft.
tradeRequest: Thou'rt honored to be granted this offer. Will thou accept?
